review: This supermarket is a life-saver! I get my lunch there if I need to. From every day—sandwiches to fresh berries, and bread... you name it. It’s so convenient because it’s right next to our building. Couldn’t ask for a better spot for quick, and tasty meals.
The prices have definitely gone up lately, but I still go to Subway twice a month just for their subs. The one with chicken, American cheese, salad, and salsa is absolutely fantastic.

This is the place I go every day for my breakfast. The coffee is always perfect, and the croissant? Absolutely to die for! I honestly can't imagine starting my day without it. Coffee and croissant for life, I guess. I don’t know how I’d survive without this spot in my routine. Highly recommend!
The burgers they make here are top-tier! Juicy, flavourful, and cooked just right. Every bite is a taste of perfection.
Yummy sandwiches with a huge selection of fillings. The ques can be quite long at lunch time, but they move quickly.
